SEARCH
Package pt.uc.dei.mapper

Interface UserMapper

public interface UserMapper
MapStruct mapper interface for converting between UserEntity and its DTO representations.

  • Uses CDI component model for dependency injection.
  • Handles nested mappings for manager, appraisals, and finished courses.
  • Ignores sensitive fields (e.g., password) in DTOs for security.
  • Prevents infinite recursion by using qualified mappings for manager fields.
  • Supports partial updates via updateUserFromDto.
  • Provides minimal and full DTO conversions for different use cases.
Mapping summary:
  • toDto: Maps UserEntity to UserDTO (basic user info, manager as ManagerDTO).
  • toEntity: Maps UserDTO to UserEntity (manager as UserEntity, ignores some fields).
  • updateUserFromDto: Updates an existing UserEntity from a UserDTO, ignoring nulls and immutable fields.
  • toFullDto: Maps UserEntity to UserFullDTO (includes appraisals and completed courses).
  • toUserResponseDto: Maps UserEntity to UserResponseDTO (for API responses, includes online status, last seen, etc.).
  • toManagerDto: Maps a manager UserEntity to ManagerDTO (for nested manager info).
  • toManagerEntity: Maps ManagerDTO to a minimal UserEntity (for manager references).
Note: Uses AppraisalMapper, FinishedCourseMapper, and CourseMapper for nested mappings.
